properties.description: 관세청 수출입 정보 및 환율 정

oracleReaderQuery.value: select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_API_INDUSTRY_KMA_WEATHER_D' ) as result from dual;
@concat('select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(''U'' , p_seq => ''', activity('Input log').output.firstRow.RESULT, ''', p_result => ''S'') as result from dual')

@concat('select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(''U'' , p_seq => ''', activity('Input log').output.firstRow.RESULT, ''', p_result => ''E'', p_error_msg => ''', replace(activity('PIP_API_INDUSTRY_KMA_WEATHER_D').Error.Message, '''','‘'),''') as result from dual')

preCopyScript.value:
@{concat('delete from ', pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable, ' where date = ''',
formatDateTime(addDays(addHours(utcNow(), 9),int(item().date)),'yyyyMMdd'),''' and projectid = ''',pipeline().parameters.Channel,''';')}
